[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: move_modules] [Friends Module Manipulation] Can the friends (Jsonb) list be manipulated to bypass Move friendship access control? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: move_resources] [Resource Data Nullability] The data field is Nullable Jsonb - can NULL data cause resource access failures or indicate corrupted resources? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: move_resources] [Resource Deletion Inconsistency] Can is_deleted be false for deleted resources, causing applications to read non-existent on-chain data? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: move_resources] [Generic Type Params] The generic_type_params (Nullable Jsonb) - can malformed generic parameters cause type resolution errors? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: move_resources] [State Key Hash Collision] Can state_key_hash (66 char limit) collisions cause different resources to map to the same entry? (High)
[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: nft_points] [Amount Manipulation] Can the amount (Numeric) field for NFT points be manipulated to inflate or deflate point balances? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: nft_points] [Point Type Validation] The point_type field is Text - can arbitrary point types bypass point system restrictions? (Low)
[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: nft_points] [Token Name Unbounded] The token_name field is Text with no length limit - can excessively long names cause storage issues? (Low)
[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: objects] [GUID Creation Overflow] Can guid_creation_num (Numeric) overflow, causing object address collisions in newly created objects? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: objects] [Object Deletion History] Can is_deleted be toggled multiple times without proper versioning, corrupting object lifecycle history? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: objects] [Write Set Change Ordering] Does the write_set_change_index properly order object operations within a transaction, or can ordering cause state inconsistencies? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: processor_status] [Version Rollback] Can last_success_version be decremented, causing processors to reprocess transactions and corrupt derived state? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: processor_status] [Processor Name Collision] The processor field is limited to 50 characters - can name collisions cause status confusion? (Low)
[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: processor_status] [Timestamp Manipulation] Can last_updated be manipulated to hide processor staleness or failures? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: processor_statuses] [Success Flag Manipulation] Can the success boolean be set to true for failed processing, hiding indexer errors? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: processor_statuses] [Details Field Injection] The details field is Nullable Text - can malicious error messages cause log injection or XSS in monitoring tools? (Low)
[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: processor_statuses] [Version Consistency] Can the version field be inconsistent with actual processed data, causing sync issues? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: proposal_votes] [Vote Weight Manipulation] Can num_votes (Numeric) be manipulated to give voters disproportionate voting power? (Critical)
[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: proposal_votes] [Vote Direction Inconsistency] Can should_pass be changed after vote submission, enabling vote manipulation? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: proposal_votes] [Staking Pool Verification] Can voter_address vote with staking_pool_address without proper authorization, enabling voting power theft? (Critical)
[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: proposal_votes] [Duplicate Vote Prevention] Does the composite key prevent double voting on the same proposal? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: signatures] [Public Key Length] The public_key field is limited to 66 characters - can this accommodate all signature schemes (Ed25519, Secp256k1, multi-sig)? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: signatures] [Signature Length] The signature field is limited to 200 characters - can complex multi-sig signatures exceed this limit? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: signatures] [Threshold Manipulation] Can the threshold (Int8) be manipulated to lower multi-sig requirements, enabling unauthorized transactions? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/schema.rs] [Table: signatures] [Public Key Indices] The public_key_indices (Jsonb) - can malformed indices cause multi-sig verification failures or bypasses? (High)
